about_the_game: A stealth and survival horror first-person game fro PC, focused on lovers of suspense, psychological terror and conspiracies, in which a content creator and influencer during the celebrations of the Day of the Dead, on 2 of November, in the Huasteca Potosina, México, known as Xantolo, is persecuted by a cult of death that fuses pre-Hispanic culture with Spanish, They have awakened dark forces and unknown creatures that you will have to face with your ingenuity and solve different puzzles in order to get out alive. Are you ready to face your Nightmares?

content_descriptors.notes: The game may contain some violence and blood, due to cults and sacrifices.

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 ／ AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM ／ AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM.

short_description: A PC game blending suspense, psychological terror, and conspiracies. Set during the Day of the Dead in Huasteca Potosina, Mexico, the protagonist, a content creator, is hunted by a death cult. Awakened dark forces and puzzles challenge players to survive this stealth and survival horror experience.
